pages.text: Pillar blocks are always made using 2 polished blocks of that material's set.  They are one of the few block types to not have slabs, stairs, walls, and gates, since they can be oriented on all 3 axis.

Corner Pillars are a new block type added by Consistency+ which use the top texture of a pillar on all 6 faces. Crafting them in the inventory or crafting table has a 4:3 ratio, however you can use the stonecutter for a 1:1 ratio.
